description: Aloni, Shulamit, 1928- -- Photographs; Arafat, Yasir, 1929-2004 -- Photographs
label: Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat met in Gaza on July 20,1995 with Israeli Communication Minister Ms. Shulamit Aloni discussing the political issues regarding the peace process and the water issue as well radio and television frequencies for the Palestinian electronic media.
